name: Defend the Treasure - One Piece
description:
The Straw Hat Crew has just finished gathering enough treasure to travel to the New World. But the navy and the other pirates are very aware and are on their way to steal their goods. Help Luffy and his friends to protect their spoil!

This is a Plants vs Zombies like 2D game.  Supported in 16:9 (click on fullscreen) and 4:3 resolutions.

Have fun!
